title: ArtyTorrent Pack 43-Old School Electro Drum Loops 100-109 bpm-WA
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 43-Old School Electro Drum Loops 100-109 bpm-WAV
-----------------------------------------------------------------

If you like the sound of the classic Roland drum machines (the TR-808 especially) or the SP-12 sampler, then you should enjoy this pack. These are fairly dry loops with that 1980&#039;s electro hip hop flavour. (Think "Planet Rock" and "Al-Naafyish"). Perfect for downsampling or bit-crushing for an authentic retro vibe.
The tempo ranges from 100-109 bpm.

Torrent contains 6 RAR files with 80 loops.
-------------------------------------------
Chicago Fire Old Skool Electro Beats 100-105 (7 loops)
House Electro Drums TR-808 100 (8 loops)
Mac Money Electro HH 100-107 (24 loops)
Misc Electro Beats 100-110 (23 loops)
Robotic Computer 100 (6 loops)
Tekno Electro TR-909 100 (12 loops)

As usual, all samples have been normalized and acidized and are 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames.

The samples are from a wide variety of sources including CDs produced by Sony/Acid and Syntrillium.

--
Arty - "It was acceptable in the eighties."
8th February 2008.

Comments and requests are welcome. Gratitude and seeders are more than welcome! :)
